statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM customer_behavior WHERE preferences->'language' = 'English';
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, JSON_EXTRACT(preferences, '$.category') as category FROM customer_behavior WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(preferences, '"category":"electronics"');
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE LENGTH(purchase_history) > 100;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, JSON_EXTRACT(preferences, '$.subscription_status') as subscription_status FROM customer_behavior WHERE JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(preferences, '$.subscription_status')) = 'active';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shoppers_segments WHERE total_shoppers >= 1000;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM shopper_segments WHERE total_shoppers BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location='California' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE '%n';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE location='Texas' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM shoppers;
SELECT shopper_id, shopper_name, registration_date FROM shoppers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT shopper_name, shopper_email FROM shoppers WHERE shopper_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name FROM preferences WHERE preference_description LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT shopper_name, last_purchase_date FROM shoppers WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shoppers;
SELECT shopper_name, registration_date, last_purchase_date FROM shoppers;
SELECT shopper_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM shoppers INNER JOIN purchases ON shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id;
SELECT shopper_name, preference_name, preference_description FROM shoppers INNER JOIN preferences ON shoppers.shopper_id = preferences.shopper_id;
SELECT shopper_name, total_amount FROM shoppers INNER JOIN purchases ON shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount >= 100;
SELECT customer_name, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT customer_id, category FROM preferences WHERE preference_level >= 3;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, category, price FROM customers CROSS JOIN products WHERE gender = 'Male' AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, preference_level, category FROM preferences INNER JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE preference_level > 3;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments WHERE segment_id < 5 ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
